thread.title: India will be world leader under Modi's leadership: Nitin Gadkari
thread.title_full: India will be world leader under Modi's leadership: Nitin Gadkari

title: India will be world leader under Modi's leadership: Nitin Gadkari
text:
Dadri lynching: Congress accuses PM Modi of 'selective amnesia' 
Nagpur: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari today said under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, India will become the world leader. 
"Narendra Modi is the first PM of India after Independence who has built the real image of the country in the world. He will give the best direction to the nation," the Union Transport Minister said here. 
He was speaking at the launch of a book which contains writings on Modi and some other union ministers titled ' Mahanayak ', published by Shri Narkesari Prakashan Ltd here. Read Also: Vested interests opposing road safety bill: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari 
"Narendra Modi is a nationalist and he will make India a vishwa guru (world leader)," he said. 
"The process of development in India is in full swing. But this development is not being accepted by the opposition and therefore they are deliberately confusing the people of India. 
"Thanks to the efforts of Prime Minister, Indian culture and development is being talked about on the global platform," Gadkari added. 
RSS General Secretary Bhaiyaji Joshi was also present on the occasion.
